Diff.description:
Includes an expected and actual value. Can be used to display the difference
between the two in case a test is wrong - it might help users to know what
failed (e.g. with two strings).

actual.description: - The actual value produced by the submission under test.

expected.description: - The value that the test plan expected.

NestedGroup.description: A group containing other groups as children.

name.description: - Name of the group. This is visible to students.

sprite.description:
- If this group is linked to a sprite, its name is included
here. This might be useful to include an image of the sprite or something.

summary.description:
- Optional summary to display. Especially usefull when
the group is collapsed.

visibility.description: - Visibility of the group. See the docs.

Test.description: A test, actually checking if a condition holds for the submission under test.

feedback.description: - The feedback on the test. This is intended for students.

name.description:
- Internal name of the test. Only for debugging/identification
purposes. Students should not see it.

status.description: - The status of the test. See the docs for more info.

TestGroup.description: A group containing tests as children.

name.description: - Name of the group. This is visible to students.

sprite.description:
- If this group is linked to a sprite, its name is included
here. This might be useful to include an image of the sprite or something.

summary.description:
- Optional summary to display. Especially usefull when
the group is collapsed.

visibility.description: - Visibility of the group. See the docs.

Visibility.description:
The visibility of a group.

- Show means display this group and all it's children (non-nested).
- Collapse means display this group, but hide children,  unless an
  error occurs.
- Hide means do not display this group, unless an error occurs.

description: Top level object, containing a number of groups.
